mapper.select: SELECT a.authority_id as authorityId, a.authority as authority, up.expire_time as expireTime, a.service_id as serviceId, 'user' as owner FROM base_user_authority AS up LEFT JOIN base_authority AS a ON up.authority_id = a.authority_id WHERE up.user_id = #{userId} and a.status = 1

SELECT a.*, up.expire_time as expireTime FROM base_user_authority AS up LEFT JOIN base_authority AS a ON up.authority_id = a.authority_id LEFT JOIN base_user AS u ON up.user_id = u.user_id WHERE up.user_id = #{userId} and a.status = 1
